login_page.header: Log in with Discord to access the Craig dashboard.
login_page.disclaimer: We use cookies to keep you logged in. By logging in, you allow us to store and use them.

supporter_status.dev_tier: A developer gave you this tier!

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred, try again later.
errors.server_error: A server error occurred, try again later.
errors.invalid_body: We sent an invalid request to the server, you probably shouldn't see this. Reload the page if this issue persists.
errors.login: You need to log in to do this.
errors.unauthorized: Your login has expired, please reload the page.
errors.feature_unavailable: You requested to use a feature that you can't use.
errors.not_supporter: A Supporter tier is required for this action.
errors.need_higher_tier: A higher Supporter tier is needed for this action.

connection_errors.NO_ACCESS_TOKEN: Could not get an access token from {service}, try again later.
connection_errors.NO_USER_DATA: Could not get user data from {service}, try again later.
connection_errors.INVALID_SCOPE: You have provided partial permissions to Craig. Cloud upload will not work unless all permissions are checked.
connection_errors.USER_ID_MISMATCH: The Discord account linked to your Patreon account does not match the one you are logged into currently. Please change your Discord account connection in Patreon and then try again.

cloud_upload.enable_desc: Allow Craig to automatically upload recordings to your upload service. This only applies to recordings you start.
cloud_upload.revoke_app_perms: You may also revoke app permissions in your {service} settings.

survey.text: Please take this quick survey and give some feedback about Craig.
